name: Actua Pool
summary: Actua Pool lets players hustle their way around the local pool circuit to unlock different clubs and challengers in an effort to win cash and prove who is King of the Cue. The DS touch screen and Stylus provides the perfect interface for pool allowing gamers to dictate everything through touch. They use the stylus to line up shots, set the power, determine the cue angle and add spin to the ball.
